sentences: Software Developer (C#
Net Core Azure) *Remote WfH / London* to £80k

Are you an experienced Software Developer who would thrive within a start-up environment? You could be joining a tech driven payments company that provide a good work life balance and excellent career progression
Benefits:
Remote working
Up to £80k plus shares
Modern, cloud-based tech stack
Continuous training and development
Your role:
As a Software Developer you'll design and develop features, and enhance existing ones, for the company's B2B
Net payments platform
You'll be part of an exciting start-up culture where you'll be encouraged to take ownership, voice your ideas, and make your mark as a C# Developer
The team use a modern tech stack including C#,
Net Core, Kubernetes, Azure, and serverless Microservices architecture
WfH policy:
The company is based in London however, you'll be able to work remotely if you are commutable to the office on a monthly basis for team events and meetings
Ideal requirements:
You are an experienced C# Developer who has developed applications in
Net Core
You are familiar with cloud technologies (Azure)
You ideally have experience with Kubernetes and serverless Microservices architecture
You have excellent communication and collaboration skills
As a Software Developer you can expect to earn a competitive salary (up to £80k) plus benefits
Apply today or call to find out more about this Software Developer (C#
Net Core) role
